the_rules_of_APP_NAME.one: The first rule of %(APP_NAME)s is: Do not lose your password.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.second: The second rule of %(APP_NAME)s is: Do not lose your password.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.third: The third rule of %(APP_NAME)s is: We cannot recover your password.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.fourth: The fourth rule: If you can remember the password, it's not secure.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.fifth: The fifth rule: Use only randomly-generated passwords.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.sixth: The sixth rule: Do not tell anyone your password.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.seventh: The seventh rule: Always back up your password.

recoveraccountstep1_jsx.unable_to_recover_account_not_change_own: We are unable to recover this account, it has not changed ownership recently.
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.password_not_used_in_last_days: This password was not used on this account in the last 30 days.
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.request_already_submitted_contact_suppor: Your request has been already submitted and we are working on it. Please contact %(SUPPORT_EMAIL)s for the status of your request.
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.recover_account_intro: From time to time, a Steemian's owner key may be compromised. Stolen Account Recovery gives the rightful account owner 30 days to recover their account from the moment the thief changed their owner key. Stolen Account Recovery can only be used on %(APP_URL)s if the account owner had previously listed '%(APP_NAME)s' as their account trustee and complied with %(APP_NAME)s's Terms of Service.
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.login_with_facebook_or_reddit_media_to_v: Please login with Facebook or Reddit to verify your identity
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.login_with_social_media_to_verify_identi: Please login with %(provider)s to verify your identity
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.enter_email_toverify_identity: We need to verify your identity. Please enter your email address below to begin the verification.
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.thanks_for_submitting_request_for_accoun: Thanks for submitting your request for Account Recovery using %(APP_NAME)s's blockchain-based multi factor authentication. We will respond to you as quickly as possible, however, please expect there may be some delay in response due to high volume of emails. Please be prepared to verify your identity.
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.cant_confirm_account_ownership: We can't confirm account ownership. Check your password
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.account_recovery_request_not_confirmed: Account recovery request is not confirmed yet, please get back later, thank you for your patience.

user_profile.this_is_users_reputations_score_it_is_ba:
This is %(name)s's reputation score.

The reputation score is based on the history of votes received by the account, and is used to hide low quality content.

voting_jsx.changing_to_a_downvote_will_reset_curati: Changing to a Down-Vote will reset your curation rewards for this post

witnesses_jsx.set_witness_proxy: You can also choose a proxy that will vote for witnesses for you. This will reset your current witness selection.
witnesses_jsx.witness_set: You have set a voting proxy. If you would like to re-enable manual voting, please clear your proxy.

votesandcomments_jsx.no_responses_yet_click_to_respond: No responses yet. Click to respond.

userkeys_jsx.posting_key_is_required_it_should_be_dif: The posting key is used for posting and voting. It should be different from the active and owner keys.
userkeys_jsx.the_active_key_is_used_to_make_transfers: The active key is used to make transfers and place orders in the internal market.
userkeys_jsx.the_owner_key_is_required_to_change_othe: The owner key is required to change the other keys.
userkeys_jsx.the_private_key_or_password_should_be_ke: The private key or password for the owner key should be kept offline as much as possible.
userkeys_jsx.the_memo_key_is_used_to_create_and_read_: This key can be used to send and view encrypted memos on the Steem blockchain.
userkeys_jsx.userkeys_info_1: Any password or key is more likely to get compromised the more it is used. That's why Steem uses a hierarchical key system to keep you safe. You are issued with Steem and TRON keys which have different permissions. For example, the Posting Key (which is intended to be used frequently) has a limited set of permissions for social actions that require less security. You'll need to be more careful with your Active Key since it has permissions to perform wallet related actions.
userkeys_jsx.userkeys_info_2: Please take note of your Steem and TRON Keys listed below. Ideally, use a Password Manager (like 1Password or LastPass) or store an offline copy safely (on a piece of paper or on a file on a USB drive).

tron_account.title: TRON Account
tron_account.desc1: TRON account address is used for receiving TRX rewards. TRX rewards are given in proportion to the number of SP you can redeem.
tron_account.desc2: TRON account address is also the TRON account public key. It is used for transfers. The public key is the address you send the tokens to.
tron_account.desc3: The private key has the highest authority on your TRON account. It is used for signing transactions of TRON, such as transferring tokens, freezing and voting.
tron_account.tron_key_tip: Please check in the PDF containing public and private keys of the TRON account. If you are using an existing TRON account, please use the private key of the account.
tron_account.tron_account_permissions1: Use your TRON Private key to:

posting_key.title: Posting Key
posting_key.desc1: This key should be used for social networking actions, like posting, commenting and voting. This key has a limited set of permissions and it is not able to be used for monetary actions. So you can't lose money if someone else gets access to this key.
posting_key.desc2: Use this key to log in to other Steem-powered social networks like Steemit, Busy and eSteem. Store this key safely.

active_key.title: Active Key
active_key.desc1: This key has additional permissions for more sensitive monetary-related actions, like transferring and exchanging tokens.
active_key.desc2: When performing a wallet related action, you may be prompted to authenticate with your Active key. You should only enter your Active Key into apps which you trust because anyone with access to this key can take your tokens. Do yourself a favor and store this key safely to avoid losing tokens in the future.
active_key.active_Key_permissions6: Place an order on an exchange

owner_key.title: Owner Key
owner_key.desc: The owner key is required to change the other keys. This key has additional permissions to recover your account or change your other keys. It's the most important key and should be securely stored offline.
owner_key.owner_Key_permissions2: Reset Owner, Active, and Posting keys

memo_key.title: Memo Key
memo_key.desc: The Memo key because it is a bit of an outlier. The only thing the Memo Key can do is encrypt and decrypt private messages that are sent through the blockchain. While this could one day be a powerful feature, today it is not commonly used. If you have received a private message that you would like to decrypt, as always you should use the key with the minimum necessary authorities, which in this case would be the Memo Key.

public_key.title: Public Keys
public_key.desc1: Each Steem Key has a public and private key to encrypt and decrypt data. Public keys are associated with usernames and can be used to look up associated transactions on the blockchain. Your public keys are not required for login on Steemit.com and you don't need to store these safely.
public_key.desc2: View public key information for this account (in the 'Authorities' module):

suggestpassword_jsx.APP_NAME_cannot_recover_passwords_keep_t: %(APP_NAME)s cannot recover passwords. Keep this page in a secure location, such as a fireproof safe or safety deposit box.
suggestpassword_jsx.after_printing_write_down_your_user_name: After printing, write down your user name

converttosteem_jsx.your_existing_DEBT_TOKEN_are_liquid_and_: Your existing %(DEBT_TOKEN)s are liquid and transferable. Instead you may wish to trade %(DEBT_TOKEN)s directly in this site under %(link)s or transfer to an external market.
converttosteem_jsx.this_is_a_price_feed_conversion: This is a price feed conversion. The 3.5 day delay is necessary to prevent abuse from gaming the price feed average.
converttosteem_jsx.DEBT_TOKEN_will_be_unavailable: This action will take place 3.5 days from now and can not be canceled. These %(DEBT_TOKEN)s will immediately become unavailable.

tips_js.liquid_token:
Tradeable tokens that may be transferred anywhere at anytime.
%(LIQUID_TOKEN)s can be converted to %(VESTING_TOKEN)s in a process called powering up.
tips_js.influence_token: Influence tokens which give you more control over post payouts and allow you to earn on curation rewards.
tips_js.estimated_value: Total account asset valuation in USD.
tips_js.non_transferable: %(VESTING_TOKEN)s is non-transferable and requires 1 month (4 payments) to convert back to %(LIQUID_TOKEN)s.
tips_js.converted_VESTING_TOKEN_can_be_sent_to_y: Converted %(VESTING_TOKEN)s can be sent to yourself or someone else but can not transfer again without converting back to %(LIQUID_TOKEN)s.
tips_js.part_of_your_steem_power_is_currently_de: Part of %(user_name)s's STEEM POWER is currently delegated. Delegation is donated for influence or to help new users perform actions on Steemit. Your delegation amount can fluctuate.
tips_js.steem_power_apr: STEEM POWER increases at an APR of approximately %(value)s%, subject to blockchain variance. See FAQ for details.

promote_post_jsx.spend_your_DEBT_TOKEN_to_advertise_this_: Spend your %(DEBT_TOKEN)s's to advertise this post in the promoted content section
promote_post_jsx.this_post_was_hidden_due_to_low_ratings: This post was hidden due to low ratings

about_jsx.about_app_details: %(APP_NAME)s is a social media platform where everyone gets paid for creating and curating content. It leverages a robust digital points system, called Steem, that supports real value for digital rewards through market price discovery and liquidity.

markdownviewer_jsx.images_were_hidden_due_to_low_ratings: Images were hidden due to low ratings.

userwallet_jsx.tokens_worth_about_1_of_LIQUID_TICKER: Tokens worth about $1.00 of %(LIQUID_TICKER)s, currently collecting %(sbdInterest)s%% APR.
userwallet_jsx.tradeable_tokens_transferred: Tradeable tokens that may be transferred anywhere at anytime.
userwallet_jsx.next_power_down_is_scheduled_to_happen: The next power down is scheduled to happen
userwallet_jsx.trx_description: TRX connects the entire TRON ecosystem. You can send TRX anytime, anywhere. You can gain promising return by freezing your tokens and voting for SR to advance the TRON ecosystem. TRX rewards will be distributed in proportion to the number of SP you can redeem.
userwallet_jsx.trx_description1: TRX connects the entire TRON ecosystem. You can send TRX anytime, anywhere.
userwallet_jsx.trx_description2: You can gain promising return by freezing your tokens and voting for SR to advance the TRON ecosystem.
userwallet_jsx.trx_description3: TRX rewards will be distributed in proportion to the number of SP you can redeem.
userwallet_jsx.trx_description3_1: The distribution process may take several minutes.
userwallet_jsx.trx_description6: and import your TRON account to manage TRX assets.
userwallet_jsx.trx_description7: This TRON account is only used to receive TRX rewards and it is not recommended to transfer assets to this account or to store assets.
userwallet_jsx.create_trx_description: You must have a TRON account first. Please click "Create A TRON Account" on the right side to claim TRX rewards.
userwallet_jsx.bind_exist_tron_addr_description_1: In case of any loss, before linking an existing TRON account, please ensure:
userwallet_jsx.bind_exist_tron_addr_description_2: You have securely stored the private key of the current TRON account, or
userwallet_jsx.bind_exist_tron_addr_description_3: you have imported this account into other wallets that support TRON accounts, or
userwallet_jsx.bind_exist_tron_addr_description_4: you have transferred assets in this account to your other TRON accounts.
userwallet_jsx.bind_exist_tron_addr_description_5: After linking an existing TRON account, the TRX rewards will be distributed to the linked account.
userwallet_jsx.bind_exist_tron_addr_description_6: Are you sure to link your existing TRON account?
userwallet_jsx.enter_the_tron_account_addr_you_wish_to_: Enter the TRON account address you wish to link

powerdown_jsx.already_power_down: You are already powering down %(AMOUNT)s %(LIQUID_TICKER)s (%(WITHDRAWN)s %(LIQUID_TICKER)s paid out so far). Note that if you change the power down amount the payout schedule will reset.
powerdown_jsx.delegating: You are delegating %(AMOUNT)s %(LIQUID_TICKER)s. That amount is locked up and not available to power down until the delegation is removed and 5 days have passed.
powerdown_jsx.warning: Leaving less than %(AMOUNT)s %(VESTING_TOKEN)s in your account is not recommended and can leave your account in a unusable state.

checkloginowner_jsx.if_you_did_not_make_this_change: If you did not make this change please
checkloginowner_jsx.i_understand_dont_show_again: I understand, don't show me again

termsagree_jsx.please_review: Please review our terms to continue
termsagree_jsx.blurb: Our Terms of Service set the rules and guidelines that you must accept and follow in order to use Steemit and our Privacy Policy explains the type of information we collect and what we do with it. Don't worry, we don't sell your data to anyone. We do use it to meet legal requirements and to learn how to make Steemit better.

modals_jsx.out_of_bandwidth_title: Why? You've run out of Resource Credits
modals_jsx.out_of_bandwidth_reason: Actions such as posting and voting use computing resources, placing a real cost on the community members who run the Steem blockchain for everyone.
modals_jsx.out_of_bandwidth_reason_2: To keep things free, Steem intelligently allocates Resource Credits to each user based on their Steem Power holdings, which can be used to submit a limited number of feeless transactions. When a user runs low on Resource Credits, they will either need to wait for them to recharge, or purchase additional Steem Power. This system prioritizes actions by good community members while limiting spam.
modals_jsx.out_of_bandwidth_option_1: Buy and hold more Steem Power
modals_jsx.out_of_bandwidth_option_2: Wait until your Resource Credits recharge
modals_jsx.out_of_bandwidth_option_3: Wait until the network usage decreases

wallet_index.title: Steem wallet login
wallet_index.description: Welcome to Steemit's official Steem blockchain wallet. Use it to transfer Steem tokens, Power up, vote for Steem Witnesses and change your Steem profile details.

steem_proposals.confirm_remove_proposal_description: Proposal removal is permanent and the fee paid for creating the proposal is not refundable.

tron_jsx.content0: Vote with TRX for SR nodes to contribute to the TRON ecosystem and you’re expected to earn over 8%% APY.
tron_jsx.content1: You need to freeze TRX first to get the voting right before casting your vote.
tron_jsx.step1: Step1: click "Voting" to access Tronscan voting page
tron_jsx.step2: Step2: click "Link wallet", and then select "Import account to log in".
tron_jsx.step3: Step3: enter the private key of your TRON account and click "Login".
tron_jsx.step4: Step4: click the "Vote" button and follow the instructions.
tron_jsx.update_tron_content: Please confirm the information below before updating your TRON account to avoid unnecessary asset loss.
tron_jsx.update_tron_content1: The private key for this TRON account has been saved,
tron_jsx.update_tron_content2: or this TRON account has been imported to other TRON-supporting wallets,
tron_jsx.update_tron_content3: or assets in this TRON account has been transfered to your other TRON accounts.
tron_jsx.update_tron_content4: After updating your TRON account, your TRX rewards will be distributed to your updated TRON account.
tron_jsx.update_tron_content5: Do you agree to update your TRON account and download the PDF containing the public and private keys of the updated TRON account？
tron_jsx.update_tron_content6: This operation requires logging in with your Active or Owner key or Master password.
tron_jsx.update_success_content: Your TRON account has been updated.
tron_jsx.update_success_content2: Please keep it safe, otherwise we cannot recover it for you.Please do not share the file with anyone else.
tron_jsx.create_tron_account: Create a TRON account and claim rewards
tron_jsx.create_tron_account_content: Steemit will distribute extra TRX to you as rewards. This account is for receiving such rewards.
tron_jsx.create_tron_account_content1: The system will automatically create a TRON account for you for free.
tron_jsx.create_tron_account_content2: Do you agree to create a TRON account and download the PDF with your TRON public and private keys?
tron_jsx.create_tron_success_content: You have created a TRON account.
tron_jsx.create_tron_success_content3: to download the PDF with your TRON public and private keys.
tron_jsx.unbind_tron_addr: This user does not have a TRON account
tron_jsx.private_key_does_not_match_address_in_tr: Private key does not match address in transaction

tron_err_msg.data_is_invalid: Data is invalid. Please check if you are using the correct private key.
tron_err_msg.need_active_or_owner_key: This operation requires logging in with your Active or Owner key or Master password.

copy_password.back_up_tips: Please copy and save this master password for future login.Please note: Steemit does not keep records of anyone's password. Lost passwords cannot be retrieved. Please save your password properly.
